en: The Sakharov Prize is an award named after the Russian scientist Sakharov.
pinyin: Sākèluòfū jiǎng shì yǐ É luó sī kē xué jiā Sākèluòfū wèi míng de jiǎngxiàng.

en: Last year, women's rights activist Li Wenzu received the Sakharov Prize.
pinyin: Qùnián, nǚquán yùndòng zhě Lǐ Wénzú huòdéle Sākèluòfū jiǎng.

en: The Sakharov Prize is regarded as a symbol of defending human rights and freedoms.
pinyin: Sākèluòfū jiǎng bèi yù wèi shì wéi hù rénquán zìyóu de xiàngzhēng.

en: Curiosity kills the cat, but why can the 蟓 survive?

en: It is also considered as one of the traditional cultural symbols of China.
pinyin: xiàn de xíng tài měi lì, bèi xǔ duō wén rén mò kè men zàn sòng guò, yě shì zhōng guó de chuán tǒng wén huà qì guān zhī yī, The shape of the 蟓 is beautiful and has been praised by many scholars and poets in Chinese culture.

en: I put a screen protector on my phone to protect the screen from getting scratched.
pinyin: Wǒ zài shǒujī shàng tiē le hù bèi jiāo mó, bǎohù píngmù bù bèi guā huā le.

en: The tablets in our company all use screen protectors to protect their screens.
pinyin: Wǒmen gōngsī de píngbǎn diànnǎo dōu cǎiyòng le hù bèi jiāo mó lái bǎohù píngmù.
